title: Organic_CPU Copilot Output
description: Safety-enveloped decision and eco summary for a chat-based AI orchestrator. The 'metadata' object is reserved for optional diagnostics and future extensions.

decision.description: The safety-enveloped decision for the current interaction. Clients implement behavior based solely on this directive.

eco.description: Summary of ecological metrics for the session.

eco_impact_score.description: Normalized environmental impact score of the session (lower is better).

device_hours.description: Total hours the device has been in use during the session.

metadata.description: Optional, non-breaking extension point for diagnostics and future adaptive policy signals. Clients should ignore unknown fields.
